despotism.name: Despotism
despotism.description: The default government with no bonuses or penalties.

monarchy.name: Monarchy
monarchy.description: +1 gold per city. Requires Feudalism tech.

republic.name: Republic
republic.description: +2 trade, -1 military unit maintenance. Requires Republic tech.

democracy.name: Democracy
democracy.description: +3 happiness, -50% war weariness. Requires Democracy tech.

communism.name: Communism
communism.description: +2 production, no happiness penalty from population. Requires Communism tech.
